content: link above is to the english pattern the pattern in danish is here 1 a wonderful and simple granny cardigan - perfect for the chilly days and summer nights it is crocheted in the well known granny pattern and is a perfect project for beginners the cardigan is crocheted in twister and twister solid that exist in a whole range of beautiful colors happy crocheting materials - hobbii twister 250g 1 skein - hobbii twister solid 110g 2 skeins - crochet hook us 7 4 5mm size one size measurement the square measures approx 40 x 40 102x102 cm before sewing abbreviations **chain** chain **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **half_double_crochet** half_double_crochet **double_crochet** double_crochet **slip_stitch** slip_stitch 1 https //hobbii dk/granny-twister-cardigan
